room.name: Entrance Hall
room.description: A grand entrance with a chandelier. You notice a faint glow coming from the Living Room to the north.

room.name: Living Room
room.description: A spacious living room with comfortable sofas. You see a glimmer of something shiny on a table.

room.name: Dining Room
room.description: An elegant dining room with a long table. You catch a whiff of a magical aroma from the Kitchen to the south.

room.name: Kitchen
room.description: A well-equipped kitchen with modern appliances. You spot a bottle labeled 'Health Potion' on the counter.

room.name: Study
room.description: A quiet study with bookshelves and a desk. A map lies on the desk, and you feel a magical presence from the Library to the west.

room.name: Library
room.description: A cozy library with leather chairs and shelves of books. A magical wand is displayed prominently on a shelf.

room.name: Garden
room.description: A beautiful garden with flowers and a fountain. You sense a hidden treasure somewhere.

item.description: A wand imbued with arcane energies.
